name: Save the Penguins
description:
Submission for the 1st  Gdevelop GameJam 2022

Credits:  Graphics, Sounds and Concept made by VirtualJourney (me).

Software used: Gdevelop / Gimp / LMMS

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 
ARROW KEYS:    Move Penguin
SPACE:                      Dig snow / Attack / Place ice block
LEFT SHIFT:           Dash

Game Goals:

SAVE THE PENGUINS!
Before the day is over, build a igloo and save your children from the ice bears.
The mean seals try to destroy your igloo! The day ends in 10 minutes. When the day ends, you and your kids have to survive the night in the igloo.

If the igloo is incomplete, it's going to get cold and you and your kids freeze to death.

Your results will be rated at the end!

How To:

When you are around a snowstack  hit Space multiple times to dig and create a ice block

Press Space in front of the ice block to drag it. Press Space again to drop it. You can drag up to 3 ice blocks. But take care, they slow you down!

Drag the ice blocks in front of your igloo (or its designated space) and press Space to build it.

Hints:

Take care of black ice  you may slip and loose your ice blocks!
During the day the global temperature is rising. The isnow stacks, ice blocks and your igloo are melting!

Known Bugs:

Of course there is never enough time to finish a game perfectly :)
- Kids animation sometimes doesn't change to "laying on the ground" when they got eaten by an ice bear .

- Statistics at the end of the game are a bit messed ab. The results are not always clear

- Attacking controls are not always flawless 

Hope you enjoy it!
